description: This file contains utility functions for socket operations and network interface information retrieval, such as select wrapper, socket data retrieval, sending/receiving data, and obtaining IP and hardware addresses.

methods.name: int _ansc_select(int width,pansc_fd_set pReadFds,pansc_fd_set pWriteFds,pansc_fd_set pExceptFds,struct timeval * pTimeout)
methods.description: Wrapper around the select() system call for monitoring multiple file descriptors for readiness.

methods.name: void _ansc_socket_fd_get(pansc_fd_set pSet,int * pSocket,int i)
methods.description: Retrieves the socket descriptor at a specified index from a fd_set.

methods.name: int send_all(int fd,char * buf,int bufsize,int c)
methods.description: Sends all bytes in a buffer through a socket, handling partial sends and retries on EINTR.

methods.name: int recv_all(int fd,char * buf,int bufsize,int c)
methods.description: Receives data from a socket, handling interruptions.

methods.name: int _ansc_get_ipv4_addr(char * netdev,unsigned int * p_n_addr,char * p_addr,int p_addr_len)
methods.description: Retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.

methods.name: int _ansc_get_hw_addr(char * netdev,char * p_addr,int p_addr_len)
methods.description: Gets the hardware (MAC) address of a specified network interface.

ctags.name: _ansc_select
ctags.signature: (int width,pansc_fd_set pReadFds,pansc_fd_set pWriteFds,pansc_fd_set pExceptFds,struct timeval * pTimeout)

ctags.pattern: /^recv_all (int fd, char *buf, int bufsize, int c)$/
